metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42717 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Hashicorp Packer before 2.3.1. The recommended sudoers configuration for Vagrant on Linux is insecure. If the host has been configured according to this documentation, non-privileged users on the host can leverage a wildcard in the sudoers configuration to execute arbitrary commands as root.

criterions.comment: vagrant: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
